price: 74. Behalve Iblies, hij was trots en was één van de ongelovigen.
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa is'takbara wakāna mina al-kāfirīna
